name: India Cares Foundation
briefDescription: India Cares Foundation is a support organisation working with over 250 Civil Society Organisations ((CSOs/ NGOs) annually to help in Donor Management & Communication, Leadership Development and Resource Mobilisation. With presence in Delhi, Chennai and Bengaluru (our base). We have helped over 700 CSOs raise Rs 44 Crore in the past 8 years. We also have worked with 215 companies, some of whom are the top names in the country, through the platforms of TCS World 10k Bengaluru  and Airtel Delhi Half Marathon, where we are the Philanthropy Partners.CSR Melas have been organised by us in association with the India Chamber of Commerce in Delhi and Jamshedpur - to help Companies connect to small and medium CSOs, and we have helped prepare project proposals for over 50 projects. We also are the Enabling Partners for 'EduDaan' an initiative to help Government Schools in Infrastructure, Teacher Training, WASH and Scholarship. This is an ongoing project supported by the CSR of 7 companies and 7 A+ Private schools in Bengaluru. We have developed a real time monitoring online platform for this project too.We help companies in identifying projects as per budget, monitoring & evaluating their CSR.
